item.title: Adding models to a 317 [pi]: Class8.java not existing
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

// Convert Class8 to Itemdef.

class8.aStringArray189 =         => itemDef.ItemActions =
class8.aStringArray189[1] =      => itemDef.ItemActions[1] =
class8.anInt190 =                => itemDef.modelRotation1 =
class8.anInt198 =                => itemDef.modelRotation2 =
class8.anInt181 =                => itemDef.modelZoom =
class8.anInt169 =                => itemDef.modelOffsetY =
class8.aByteArray178 =           => itemDef.description =
class8.aString170 =              => itemDef.name =
class8.aBoolean176  =                => itemDef.stackable =
class8.anInt165 =                => itemDef.anInt165 =
class8.anInt200 =                => itemDef.anInt200 =
class8.anInt204 =                => itemDef.anInt204 =
class8.anInt175 =                => itemDef.anInt175 =
class8.anInt197 =                => itemDef.anInt197 =
class8.anIntArray156 =           => itemDef.originalModelColors =
class8.anIntArray160 =           => itemDef.modifiedModelColors =
class8.anInt164 =                => itemDef.maleEquip2 =
class8.anInt188 =                => itemDef.femaleEquip2 =
class8.anInt194 =                => itemDef.modelOffsetX =
class8.anInt174 =                => itemDef.modelid =
    
    //begin converting

item.title: Adding models to a 317 [pi]: Class8.java not existing
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

Alright I found itemdef.java , mind helping me convert the code/ints?

if(i == ****){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "Korasi`s sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 57784; class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 60; class8.anInt198 = 1400; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -25; class8.anInt194 = -60; class8.anInt165 = 57780; class8.anInt200 = 57784; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

item.title: Adding models to a 317 [pi]: Class8.java not existing
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

Hello mopar. I was trying to add korasi to my 317 [pi] server using the tutorial in the server help forums, and it told me after putting the models into the RAW folder to add this code to class8.java:

if(i == ****){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "Korasi`s sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 57784; class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 60; class8.anInt198 = 1400; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -25; class8.anInt194 = -60; class8.anInt165 = 57780; class8.anInt200 = 57784; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

But the problem is I donâ€™t have a class8.java folder it goes to class6 then skips to like class11.
